title: Overview
text:
Welcome to immunoinformatics visualizations.
This is a website with all the available visualizations.

Diversity estimation
Available plots for Diversity estimation.


Gene repertoire

Color palletes

title: Diversity estimation
text:
Code
library(data.table)
library(reactable)

df = fread("inst/data/diversity1.txt")

reactable(df)

title: Diversity estimation
text:

library(data.table)

title: Diversity estimation
text:
Boxplot

Boxplot 1
plot for boxplot


Code
library(ggplot2)
library(ggforce)

# plot 1 ---------------------

df |>
    ggplot(aes(Group, Shannon)) +
    
    geom_point(
        position = position_jitternormal(sd_y = 0, sd_x = .035),
        shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = .15, color = "white", fill = "grey10"
    ) +
    
    geom_boxplot(alpha = .5, width = .5) +
    
    theme_minimal() +
    
    theme(
        plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20)
    )







Boxplot 2
plot for boxplot 2


Code
# plot 2 ---------------------

df |>
    ggplot(aes(Group, Shannon)) +
    
    geom_point(
        aes(fill = Patient),
        position = position_jitterdodge(jitter.width = .15, dodge.width = .5),
        shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = .15, color = "white"
    ) +
    
    geom_boxplot(aes(fill = Patient), alpha = .5, width = .5) +
    
    theme_minimal() +
    
    theme(
        plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20)
    )
